name: Is there a deadline?
content: There is, but you have plenty of time. There's no need to rush!

name: How do I scan QR Codes to find bunnies?
content: You can use the 'Scan a bunny' page within the app.
Aternatively, you can use your mobile phone's camera to scan the QR codes.

name: How do I win?
content: Once you have found a certain amount of bunnies, you win a small prize. Details on how to collect this prize will be made available.
Secondly, there's a prize for the person who finds the most bunnies. In the event of a tie, a winner will be drawn at random.

name: More about Bunny Rescue
content: Bunny rescue is a web application written by Geoff House. Full source code is available on Github: https://github.com/geoffhouse/bunnyrescue
It's written using Docker, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, and React.js. Docker images are available from Docker Hub.
